name: Tab Age Tracker
changes: Fixed issue with missing icons folder in the package
Fixed chart visibility by improving Chart.js loading procedures
Enhanced search functionality with improved error handling
Fixed 'View Details in Web Dashboard' button to properly redirect users
Added comprehensive error handling and debugging logs to help diagnose issues
Improved dynamic loading of Chart.js to ensure charts are always visible
Enhanced failure recovery mechanisms throughout the extension
technical_changes: Added robust error handling to chart initialization functions
Implemented dynamic loading for Chart.js when the library fails to load normally
Added comprehensive logging to help diagnose issues with tab creation
Fixed dashboard redirection by strengthening URL generation and error handling
Improved search parameter handling when opening the dashboard with search
Added context to error messages to help debug issues more effectively
Ensured the icons folder is properly included in the extension package
